attributes.action: Pretect our wildlife for future generations
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the   govement to Pretect our wildlife for future generations to come.
To much trophy hunting and neglecting of our wildlife is going on in our country.
All animals have rights and feelings as we do.
Our children are being exposed to high levels of animal abuse both online and tv.
Whats this telling our children.
Id like to see new powers to protect all living wildlife and new powers for them who neglect animals.
